Name: Name Change, Jerry Driscoll Walk, Manhattan
Title: A Local Law in relation to a bikeway/walkway name, Jerry Driscoll Walk, Borough of Manhattan.
BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

History.BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations
Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:


      Section 1.  The following bikeway/walkway name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.

_________________________________________________________________
      New name				Present name		Limits
_________________________________________________________________
Jerry Driscoll	Walk			East River 	  	the  Peck Slip  Bikeway/Walkway  	
		portion of the East River
    		 Bikeway/Walkway


__________________________________________________________________

      ï¿½2.  This local law shall take effect immediately.



FN/aj
LS# 882
11/24/98
12:10pm
Jerry Driscoll Walk
